message: This is a high-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product if you decide to buy it in the next round. This is a one-time offer, so you'll have to decide now.
I'll buy the product, thank you for the discount offer!

Great, glad you liked the first product! Since you bought the first product, I'm willing to give you an even better deal on this next one. This is a one-time offer, so you'll have to decide now.

You're on a roll! Since you've bought two high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to make an even sweeter deal. You can inspect it for 24 hours, and if you decide not to buy it after inspection, I'll give you a full refund of the inspection fee (which will be $20).
I'll take the high-quality product and the deal you're offering, thank you!
